Thriller.name: Seven
Thriller.author: David Fincher
Thriller.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Thriller.name: Gone Girl
Thriller.author: David Fincher
Thriller.description: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

Thriller.name: Psycho
Thriller.author: Alfred Hitchcock
Thriller.description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

Thriller.name: The Sixth Sense
Thriller.author: M. Night Shyamalan
Thriller.description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

Thriller.name: The Shining
Thriller.author: Stanley Kubrick
Thriller.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

Thriller.name: Fight Club
Thriller.author: David Fincher
Thriller.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

Thriller.name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Thriller.author: David Fincher
Thriller.description: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

Drama.name: Star Wars: Episode IV
Drama.author: George Lucas
Drama.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Drama.name: The Matrix
Drama.author: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
Drama.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Drama.name: Jurassic Park
Drama.author: Steven Spielberg
Drama.description: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

Drama.name: Inception
Drama.author: Christopher Nolan
Drama.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

Drama.name: Interstellar
Drama.author: Christopher Nolan
Drama.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Drama.name: The Hunger Games
Drama.author: Gary Ross
Drama.description: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

Cartoon.name: Finding Nemo
Cartoon.author: Andrew Stanton
Cartoon.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Cartoon.name: Moana
Cartoon.author: Ron Clements, John Musker
Cartoon.description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

Cartoon.name: The Incredibles
Cartoon.author: Brad Bird
Cartoon.description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

Cartoon.name: Up
Cartoon.author: Pete Docter
Cartoon.description: Seventy-eight year old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his home equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

Cartoon.name: Coco
Cartoon.author: Lee Unkrich, Adrian Molina
Cartoon.description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

Cartoon.name: Inside Out
Cartoon.author: Pete Docter
Cartoon.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.
